newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products up, crude boosts fuel oil.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products up, crude boosts fuel oil.

text.p: NWE oil products were stronger on Thursday, with crude helping both low and high sulphur fuel.

Gas oil prices firmed around $3 with futures but traders mostly held back from the market in continuing caution over the fallout from a record high physical delivery against the November IPE contract.
Naphtha rose sharply but traders said the impetus was from stronger crude and swaps and not its own fundamentals.
Gasoline prices gained and were waiting for further direction from NYMEX after the U.S. API and EIA reports.
